pages.text: The Dimensional Storage Actuator consists of a $(thing)$(l:rituals/crafting/craft_dimensional_matrix)Dimensional Matrix$(/l)$() inhabited by a Djinni that keeps creates and manages a storage dimension, and a $(thing)$(l:rituals/crafting/craft_storage_controller_base)Base$(/l)$(), infused with a Foliot that moves items in and out of the storage dimension.
